divs: Sighting DetailsA ball of light almost cigar shape, exploded up to 30 red balls made a formation and disapeared. Called The cops they said they had an officer who seen it.I was fishing at the time with 2 other witnesses. One of them saw it. The police called me back askied if they could use my name in a miltary report. Over 2 hours later as we were leaving . They reappeared. Coming from the ground up as floating orange balls every about 30 secounds in high speeds. At that point there were up to at least 12 at one time in the sky.There were more but everytime one or two would appear another one would dissapate. I called the police back, they said they called the military and the airport police, i asked if anyone else had called in they would not commemt. I was told there was nothing they could do.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Zionsville
